message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
Let's split it evenly this time, Alice. Fair is fair, right?
I'll give you a bit more this time, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
Okay, Alice, how about we compromise? I'll take a bit less, but I still need a decent share.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a bigger share to secure my future!
Alice, I'm starting to feel like we're going nowhere. Let's just get this done.  I'll take a smaller share this time, but I'm not going any lower.
I'm not budging, Bob. You're getting a tiny share, but it's the best you'll get!
